reviews.title: 3D Visualization
reviews.text: I run a 3D visualization business and previously relied only on recommendations. After several slow months without leads, I turned to Advantage. In a short time, they helped me create an effective cold outreach system targeting key decision-makers. We even hired additional managers to handle new leads!
reviews.author: Justin Clark

reviews.title: Auto Detailing
reviews.text: I own a small auto detailing franchise üöÄ. Stepan from Advantage showed us compelling numbers and we decided to try online marketing. We launched campaigns on YouTube, TikTok, Meta, and Google Search, and the results exceeded all expectations. Our new business doubled in just 4.5 months!
reviews.author: Brian Foster

reviews.title: E-commerce
reviews.text: My furniture online store faced tough competition üí™. Advantage developed a comprehensive strategy that included sales funnel optimization and targeted advertising. In 3 months, our sales grew by 180%.
reviews.author: Sofia Melnyk

reviews.title: Consulting
reviews.text: Our consulting firm was looking for ways to expand its client base üìà. The Advantage team proposed a unique LinkedIn marketing strategy. Result: 45 new B2B clients in the first 6 months.
reviews.author: Oleg Kovalchuk

reviews.title: Online Coaching
reviews.text:
I initially worked with Instagram producers to promote my online coaching program ‚≠ê. They were responsible for content, advertising, webinars, and overall social media presence.

Over 4 months, I spent $17,000 on Facebook ads, but the result was negative. Although I spoke with Advantage before partnering with producers, I somehow chose a different path.

After the unsuccessful experience, I turned to Advantage, and they exceeded all expectations! The team generated 5 times more leads compared to previous results. Now I see real business growth.
reviews.author: Mary Hudson

reviews.title: Restaurant
reviews.text: Our fast-food restaurant chain needed to increase foot traffic. Advantage developed a local advertising campaign that led to a 75% increase in attendance. Their attention to detail and constant campaign optimization was particularly impressive.
reviews.author: Maria Petrenko

reviews.title: SaaS Company
reviews.text: As a SaaS company, we faced the challenge of high customer acquisition costs. Advantage proposed an innovative approach to content marketing and PPC, which reduced our CAC by 40% while increasing conversion.
reviews.author: Victor Lysenko

reviews.title: Educational Project
reviews.text: Our online courses needed increased reach. Advantage developed a comprehensive strategy using various channels. In 4 months, the number of students tripled, and acquisition costs decreased by 35%.
reviews.author: Anna Vasylenko

reviews.title: Crisis Period
reviews.text: During the economic downturn, our business needed a new marketing strategy. Advantage not only helped us maintain positions but also find new growth opportunities. Their adaptability and strategic thinking helped us emerge from the crisis stronger.
reviews.author: Igor Romanenko

reviews.title: Traditional Business
reviews.text: Our traditional business needed digital transformation. The Advantage team guided us through the entire process, from strategy creation to implementation. The results exceeded expectations: 250% growth in online sales in six months. Thank you!
reviews.author: Dmytro Kovalenko

guarantee.title: Guarantee
guarantee.description: After 6 months of cooperation, you can get your money back if you don't get the proper result. We provide this guarantee because we are fully confident in achieving results for your business.

contact.headline: Contact Us
contact.title: Start Your Journey to Successful Digital Marketing Today

questions.question: How much will it cost for me?
questions.answer: It depends on the complexity of the project and the number of marketing tools needed for your case. You can get a personalized offer during our call.

questions.question: Which advertising channel should I choose?
questions.answer: No need to worry about this, during the call we will analyze your case down to the smallest details, give you a clear understanding of how your competitors advertise, and help you make a decision.

questions.question: Is it safe for me?
questions.answer: We are a British company with a branch in Poland. Before starting work, we sign a cooperation agreement that clearly outlines the scope of work and obligations of both parties.

questions.question: When will I see results?
questions.answer: Each project requires different time to achieve results. On average, return on investment occurs in the 2-3rd month of work.
